QueryToExecute:
select
  'arn:' || partition || ':ec2:' || region || ':' || account_id || ':image/' || image_id as resource,
  case
    when public then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end status,
  case
    when public then title || ' publicly accessible.'
    else title || ' not publicly accessible.'
  end reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_ec2_ami;
